reviewText:
If you are an internet voyeur, this is the tape. It is not great quality but it is not bad for what it is. If you have ever seen those short AVI and MPEG movie clips from the usenet news groups made by the guy with the video  camera in the shopping bag, pointed up, this is a 6 hour casette full of  just that. Not exactly X or even R rated. No more than you might see at the  beach, but definitely candid and a bit naughty.
Ladies with short skirts  in shopping malls, grocery stores, on the street, at school, he (or she)  did not discriminate and no short skirt was safe.
Brings out the  mischevious school boy in you.
